name: Root of Evil: Origins
storyline: Root Of Evil : Origins, is a spinoff game of the Root Of Evil series made by Red Inc Games, set between sometime before Root Of Evil VR, Root Of Evil : Origins takes us to an odd looking manor set in the deep forest, held captive by your mysterious Uncle, you have to find a way to escape.
summary: Horror Survival, You're trapped in your uncles house and you must escape!
